title: Regarding the Acquisition of Jupiter Systems, LLC by Suirui International Co., Limited
summary: The document is a presidential order issued on July 8, 2025, regarding the acquisition of Jupiter Systems, LLC by Suirui International Co., Limited. The order prohibits the transaction and mandates the divestment of all interests in Jupiter Systems and its assets by the Purchasers within 120 days. It also imposes restrictions on access to Jupiter's non-public information and assets until the divestment is completed and verified by the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS). The order outlines specific conditions and requirements for the divestment, including the destruction or transfer of intellectual property and non-public source code. Additionally, it authorizes CFIUS to implement measures to verify and enforce compliance with the order and imposes penalties for non-compliance.
